name: Grapple (itch) (David Green)
description:
This was a game design project I made with a group of some talented programmers! Shoutout to Andrew, Logan, Michael, and Kenny for our incredible hard work.

Controls:

  • Use your mouse to look around you.
  • WASD - Move
  • Spacebar - Jump
  • Left-click (hold) - Launch grapple gun
